newsitem.title: USA: Miller Building units help Q2 net climb.
newsitem.headline: Miller Building units help Q2 net climb.

text.p: Miller Building Systems Inc said Monday excellent performances by its Structures and Telecom operations helped the company post its highest profits for a second quarter over the least five years.
The company reported net income of $280,000, compared with $19,000 one year ago. Sales in the period reached $10 million, versus $7.7 million in the second quarter last year.
"The startup of our new Kansas plant is on schedule and with a strong order backlog we look forward to meeting our goals in the third quarter," said Chief Executive Officer Edward Craig.
Miller Building Systems makes building modules. Its shares were trading off 1/8 at 8-7/8.
